title: Triple-Effect
description: Come enjoy our well balanced gin cocktails at Kolm Tilli

title: Old-Fashioned
description: The old fashioned is a cocktail made by muddling sugar with bitters and water, adding whiskey (typically rye or bourbon) and our own little twist at bar Musketäär

title: Lemon
description: The Lemon is a French cocktail featuring yellow Curaçao mixed with vodka and lemonade. Come take a sip at club Shooters!

title: VelvetVodka
description: Sweet and delicious, the red velvet cocktail features a red velvet cake-flavored vodka, mixing it with cream soda and fresh strawberries. Only the best at club Level

title: Cobra
description: Come enjoy our new vodka shots at bar Veski
